features: 【Your Best Choice】 If you’re looking to dress up any room but haven’t quite figured out how, what you may be looking for is a shag area rug. Our fluffy bedroom rug give your home a boost without having to bring in any furniture or spend a lot of money. Add colors, textures to your room and living room with a simple area rug , which also enhances your other decorative items.

【Super Soft Rug】 Our shaggy living room rug features 1.4 inch velvety-soft top, a sponge interior, and an anti-slip backing that are perfect for a variety of rooms around the home. The softest touch will make you feel extremely relaxed.

【Multifunctional Rug】 Our furry fur rugs are as attractive as they are functional. Use them in open-floor plans to create a cozy nook within a larger space. The shaggy carpet used to Bedroom, Living room, Nursery, Dorm, Playroom, Reading area, Girls Boys Baby room, Theme, a gift for kids or pets.

【Cleaning & Packaging】 Use low power vacuum cleaner or add some mild detergent and gently wash by hand instead of machine to making rug more durable, then air dry. We use vacuum packing for rugs, the shape of the rugs will return to normal in 2-3 days. Please give this cute rug some time to get better!

【Fall in love with the Rug】 Rug adds the perfect amount of texture to your floor and feels greatly soft on your feet. You can lie on the carpet directly and have a rest after a busy day. Short relaxation will greatly relieve your fatigue. Let our plush rug be the first place you stand on every morning~

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Create Comfort Zone It will fit perfectly in the nursery and the feet comfortably feel like stepping on a cloud. Perfect to Decor This super soft Pink rug can be used to decorate any room and works great for that. Next page 1 Nursery Room 2 Girls Room 3 Living Room 4 Bedroom

How to clean it? We suggest you clean by below steps: Shaking it off to get extra debris out. Then use a low-power vacuum cleaner. add some mild detergent and gently wash by hand, then put the rug in the ventilation to dry. REMIND: Not machine washable Is it the same thickness as the picture? No, it has creases and the rug fibers don't look fluffy. As these rugs are vacuum packed, they need to be put flat for a week to recover to their original thickness, we are very sorry to bring you some inconvenience. Is the bottom of the rug slippery? Depending on the material on which the carpet is placed, the bottom is recommended to use a non-slip pad or use carpet tape to fix it, can better play the role of anti-slip. Can I return it if I don't like it? Sure, we suggest you to contact before returning, you will receive satisfied reply within 24 hours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Vibrant Color with a silky richness. The thickness is exactly what I was looking for - not too thick - not too thin. It is neatly sewn and there is no odor that sometimes comes with brand new rugs. This rug enriches the ambience of my room. Simply awesome.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We bought this for our nursery. The theme is Peter Pan so this was kind of like the water. It looks like I chose 5x8 and it is quite the rectangle. Not quite the size I would have liked but we are keeping it and using it. It's very long with a short width. It's very blue! Gorgeous blue! And it is very soft.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This rug is light weight, soft and just adorable. I do recommend getting the sticky tape to put under the corners to keep in place as it does slip. Looks fabulous in my daughter’s room, color is so pretty. Keep anything sticky away from it. I ordered one in grey for my sons room and love it also!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars My 9yo loves it
reviews.reviewText: The rug is as vibrant as in the photo. It's super soft and we haven't experienced shedding. I have washed it twice since we received it about a month ago. During the first wash on the gentle cycle the bottom of the rug tore. I was so disappointed. I decided to keep the rug though, because my son really loves it. I did purchase carpet stickers to keep the rug in place on the tile floors, because it slides all over otherwise. It's a very pretty rug, but it's obviously very cheaply manufactured.Side note: This is the second time I have purchased this rug. The first time I purchased it I put it in the dryer. Completely my mistake. The heat deformed the inner material and it was never the same. I didn't return the first rug, but I did end up just throwing it away.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect addition to a bedroom
reviews.reviewText: Daughter wanted some soft carpet for her room to go on top of LVP floor. This fits the bill and gives the room the look she wanted with the added comfort. It doesn't slide on the floor and stays put very well!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars vacuum seal gone wrong
reviews.reviewText: This rug was supposed to be 8x10. However, it is the same size as a 6x9 version of the same rug I had previously purchased. The difference with the two is that this one never fully inflated from the vacuum seal they sent it in. It has been a month and it is still crinkled and so badly warped that It won't even lay flat. The lines from the packaging won't come out and are so firm it feels like boning used in dresses. I would pass on this rug strictly because of how it is sent and how impossible it is to remove the crinkles. I am so disappointed. Of course by time I realized the wrinkles would not come out the return window had expired.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Ok but I wouldn't buy again
reviews.reviewText: This rug is soft and is machine washable and holds up well in the washer. I didn't dry it. I hung it out to dry. The backing could be a little more stick to help it stick to the floor cause it's so flimsy it moves around a lot. It holds things in the long hairs of the fuzz. It vacuums but with it being flimsy you have to hold it down cause the vacuum tries to suck it up. I wouldn't buy again for those reasons. All in all the quality is ok and it hasn't raveled or anything.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super soft and my daughter adores it
reviews.reviewText: Cleaning this is a pain. Take it outside and beat it, sure, but anything "clingy" still stays embedded in the deep shag fibers. Best way I'm found is carefully vacuuming with an adjustable vacuum on the highest setting.My daughter does love it though. It is super soft and actually seems quite durable. Good buy.
This product is terrible nothing like write up very poorly made I am considering not ordering anything else from amazon especially rugs. I just removed all m y items from the cart .
